titles.title: Climate Change and Hurricane Correlation and Strategy Act
Climate Change and Hurricane Correlation and Strategy Act
Climate Change and Hurricane Correlation and Strategy Act
To prohibit the President from deploying any strategic weapon, such as a nuclear bomb, for purposes of altering weather patterns or addressing climate change, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
